name: KHODARA ENVIRONMENTAL, INC., General Partner, on Behalf of EAGLE ENVIRONMENTAL, L.P., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, FISH AND BOAT COMMISSION, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Khodara Environmental, Inc. ex rel. Eagle Environmental, L.P. v. Commonwealth, Fish & Boat Commission
docket_number: Direct Appeal, No. 052 Middle District Appeal Docket 1997

parties: KHODARA ENVIRONMENTAL, INC., General Partner, on Behalf of EAGLE ENVIRONMENTAL, L.P., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, FISH AND BOAT COMMISSION, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
And now this 21st day of October, 1997, the order of Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
KHODARA ENVIRONMENTAL, INC., General Partner, on Behalf of EAGLE ENVIRONMENTAL, L.P., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, FISH AND BOAT COMMISSION, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 21, 1997.
